漺字的基本解释

漺
shuǎng
净。
冷。

漺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shuǎng］
［《廣韻》疎兩切，上養，生。］
［《廣韻》初兩切，上養，初。］
净；冷。
[②]［chuǎng］
同“磢1”。
磨擦；碰撞。

漺字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　漺； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页648第01
【唐韻】初兩切【集韻】楚兩切，?音磢。【玉篇】淨也，冷也。　又【揚子方言註】漺，錯也。與磢同。　又【廣韻】疎兩切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】所兩切，?音爽。義同。又浮也。

漺字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
漺字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Ming
shuǎng
net.
cold.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shuǎng］
["Guangyun" Nine cuts in two, nourishing and healthy. ]
["Guangyun" at the beginning of two cuts, upper raising, beginning. ]
Net; cold.
[②]［chuǎng］
Same as "磢1".
Friction; collision.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　漺; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 648 No. 01
[Tang Yun] Two cuts at the beginning of the year [Jiyun] Two cuts from Chu,? Yin Jie. [Jade articles] Net and cold.　[Yangtze Dialect Note] Ming, it's wrong. Same as Jie.　[Guangyun] Nine two cuts [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] two cuts,? The sound is cool. The same meaning. Floating again.
